title: Celestial Whisperwaves Music Pack
description: Celestial Whisperwaves, a space ambience soundtrack.
longDescription:
Embark on an otherworldly journey with our enchanting music pack, "Celestial Whisperwaves." This collection boasts 10 captivating soundtracks, meticulously crafted to transport you to the outer reaches of the cosmos. Perfect for space and futuristic ambiance games, each track is designed to immerse players in a realm of cosmic wonder.

With a diverse range of celestial melodies and ethereal soundscapes, "Celestial Whisperwaves" guarantees to elevate your in-game experience to new heights. Let the music guide you through the vastness of space, as you explore uncharted territories and marvel at the beauty of the cosmos.

Dive into a celestial adventure, where the music harmonizes with the stars,

by listening to our free demo here: Music Previews (Soundcloud)


For custom requests or any additional questions, please don't hesitate to contact us via the email provided: voxalchemiststudios@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Original Compositions
  •  Various Styles in the space, synthwave genre, from standard calm-optimistic ambience to dramatic, fearful, action soundtracks.
  •  Ideal for any kind of space or futuristic ambience style game
  • Documentation: File list documentation

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23:49

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
